headline: Lou Guzzi: Pitch It High and Soft From 40 Yards

page_title: Lou Guzzi Pitch It High and Soft From 40 Yards
slug: Lou Guzzi Pitch It High and Soft From 40 Yards
body: Top 100 Teacher Lou Guzzi demonstrates how avoiding wrist hinge on your backswing and leading with the trailing edge of the club is the key to hitting high, soft chips that land gently and stick.
